import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux"; import * as action from "../../actions"; export default () => { const [state, setState] = useState([]); const dispatch = useDispatch(); const data = useSelector(state => state.listProducts); useEffect(() => { dispatch(action.listProducts()); }, [dispatch]) useEffect(() => { setState(data);; }, [data]) return (
